statements: SELECT * FROM student_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT student_id, payment_date FROM student_payments WHERE payment_status = 'completed'
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM student_payments WHERE payment_method = 'credit card'
SELECT * FROM student_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_amount, payment_method FROM student_payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM student_payments WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, payment_amount FROM student_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM student_payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending'
SELECT student_id, payment_date FROM student_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'credit'
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM student_payments
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, phone_number FROM students WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, amount, payment_date FROM students JOIN payments ON students.id = payments.student_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, phone_number, address FROM students JOIN payments ON students.id = payments.student_id WHERE amount <= 500;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, email FROM students WHERE dob >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE dob > '2000-01-01'
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, p.amount FROM students s JOIN payments p ON s.student_id = p.student_id WHERE p.amount > 1000
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, p.amount FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC

SELECT s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, COUNT(p.payment_id) AS num_payments FROM students s LEFT JOIN payments p ON s.student_id = p.student_id GROUP BY s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name
SELECT * FROM student_payments;
SELECT student_id, payment_amount FROM student_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT student_info.student_name, student_payments.payment_amount FROM student_info INNER JOIN student_payments ON student_info.student_id = student_payments.student_id;
SELECT student_info.student_name, transactions.payment_amount FROM student_info LEFT JOIN transactions ON student_info.student_id = transactions.student_id;
SELECT student_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM student_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM student_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_info WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM student_payments GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_payments > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM security_logs GROUP BY action HAVING action_count > 5 ORDER BY action_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, phone_number FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.amount, p.payment_date, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_type FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;

SELECT s.student_id, s.first_name, a.balance, sl.timestamp, sl.event_description FROM students s JOIN accounts a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN security_logs sl ON s.student_id = sl.log_id ORDER BY sl.timestamp DESC;
